EmailTemplate.name: 201904_BK_Webinar_Alternative_Methods_of_Investment_in_Avionics_MC.201904_BK_Web
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us for a webinar on a new way to finance your avionics upgrade
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]> WEBINAR | Alternative Methods of Investment In Your Avionics Join us tomorrow for an informative webinar as we discuss a fresh approach in financing your avionics upgrades.
In this webinar, we will present the pros and cons of traditional methods of financing your aircraft avionics. We welcome your questions! From upgrading a single component to a complete integrated flight deck, this webinar will help your avionics purchasing decision process. Webinar: Alternative Methods of Investment in Your Avionics
Date/Time May 7, 2019 8-9 a.m. PST (11 a.m.-12 p.m. EST)
Who should attend this webinar?
- Aircraft Owners - Dealers and Distributors
Featured Presenters:
- Sapan Shah – Senior Product Manager, BendixKing - Robert Haim – Head of Product Marketing, BendixKing
REGISTER HERE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Alternative_Methods_of_Investment_in_Avionics.html]]>
